name: jaob
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))

stmt.origin: impbii(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)), wi(wo(w0, w1), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)), wi(wo(w0, w1), w2))

stmt.origin: jca(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wi(w0, w2))
-| wi(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)), wi(wo(w0, w1), w2))
-| wi(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wi(w0, w2))
-| wi(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, w2))

|- wb(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)), wi(wo(w0, w1), w2))
-| wi(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w1, wo(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)), wi(wo(w0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w1, wo(w0, w1))

|- wb(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)), wi(wo(w0, w1), w2))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)), wi(wo(w0, w1), w2))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wa(wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2)))

comment: Disjunction of antecedents. Compare Theorem *4.77 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 121. (Contributed by NM, 30-May-1994.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 9-Dec-2012.)
